title: Fast Eddie: Episode 221
description:
Felixstowe is a small town on the east coast of England where some suggest that nothing much happens. But in 1993, there was a bank robbery that put the Suffolk town on the front pages of the papers, along with the name 'Fast Eddie'. Today, on the UK True Crime podcast, I tell that story.

Sponsored by:
https://www.worldcarparts.co.uk/

Writing and Research
Haze at 'Murder She Wrote' podcast
